name: Contaminator
description:
CONTROLS

WASD - Character movement
Space - Jump
E - Toggle between blocks and pickaxe
Enter - Mine, Place block, Buy items
Backspace - Cancel

GAME INFO
Contaminator is about a tiny dwarf, getting by in life by disposing of radioactive waste in your mine, which in turn gives you money. 
These radioactive barrels, however, slowly deteriorate the earth they're standing on. So how do you stop that? You put more durable things
underneath the barrels, so you dont have to worry THAT much about it. Fortunately, the local smith sell those along with other pickaxes,
so that you can dig those barrels away faster, so that you wont be losing too much money, when they're on the surface. Oh, and the world
will blow up, soforth the barrels hit the earths' core, but don't worry. The steel blocks SHOULD keep them out.

Did we mention, you live in a beautiful, lush, green forest? What could possibly happen to that when you're hiding tons of
radioactive waste in the ground..?

GAMEPLAY TIPS
- You can climb on walls by pressing W when facing a wall.
- Stacking a barrel on top of a barrel causes it to "bleed" double damage to the block underneath and so on.
- You can hold enter for automining, however pressing enter in quick succession is faster than this.

Enjoy exploring the small world of Contaminator!
